Kementerian Agama Gelar Senam Bersama Perwakilan Para Guru


KBRN, Jakarta: Dalam memperingati Hari Guru Nasional yang akan jatuh pada 25 November mendatang, Kementerian Agama melakukan rangkaian awal peringatan Hari Guru Nasional dengan melakukan senam bersama dengan sejumlah perwakilan guru.Senam bersama para guru, berlangsung di halaman kompleks Kementerian Agama yang dimulai sejak pukul 07.00 WIB, juga diikuti oleh Menteri Agama dan seluruh jajaran Kemenag. Dalam pembukaan kata sambutannya, Menag, Fachrul Razi mengharapkan dengan adanya senam bersama para guru, dapat menjadi bagian dalam membangun masa depan anak bangsa."Kita harapkan ini semakin maju untuk membangun masa depan anak-anak kita yang akan memimpin kita di masa yang akan datang," kata Menag Fachrul Razi di Kementerian Agama, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (01/11/2019).Seusai menyampaikan sambutan, Fachrul membaur dan ikut melakukan senam bersama para guru. Nampak pula Wakil Menteri Agama Zainud Tauhid yang juga ikut melakukan senam.Senada dengan Menteri Agama, Kasubag TU Direktorat Guru dan Tenaga Kependidikan Madrasah, M. Sidik Sisdianto juga mengungkapkan bahwa adanya kegiatan senam bersama para guru tersebut, juga merupakan bagian untuk para guru-guru pengajar di sekolah khusus keagamaan mengenal lebih dekat dengan Menteri Agama, Fachrul Razi.Guru-guru yang mengikuti kegiatan ini merupakan guru yang mengajar dari tingkat TK hingga SMA. Sidik kemudian menjelaskan dua hal utama tujuan kegiatan ini yaitu memperkenalkan figur Menteri Agama yang baru dan membudayakan budaya sehat di lingkungan madrasah."Perkenalan menteri dan guru-guru. Kedua, kita lagi membudayakan budaya sehat di Madrasah," ungkap Kasubag TU Direktirat Guru dan Tenaga Kependidikan Madrasah, Kementerian Agama M.Sidik Sisdianto.Lebih lanjut, Sidik Sisdianto juga menuturkan secara rinci, terkait adanya kegiatan Kementerian Agama dalam memperingati Hari Guru Nasional 2019, yang puncak rangkaian acara akan diadakan di Lampung."Ini rangkaian pertama. Jadi setelah ini nanti ada gowes bersama pak Menteri dan guru-guru madrasah di Jogja tanggal 9 November. Kemudian tanggal 10 November itu ada pengumuman lomba foto dan vlog guru madrasah. Tanggal 12 sampai 16 ada anugrah konstitusi guru. Tanggal 21 sampai 23 ada anugerah guru dan tenaga berpendidikan berprestasi. Tanggal 21-23 ada lomba inovasi pembelajaran untuk guru dan puncaknya di Lampung nanti, setelah itu ada simposium guru," pungkas M.Sidik Sisdianto, Kasubag TU Direktirat Guru dan Tenaga Kependidikan Madrasah, Kementerian Agama.

The Ministry of Religion Holds Joint Gymnastics Representatives of Teachers


KBRN, Jakarta: In commemoration of the National Teacher's Day which will fall on November 25, the Ministry of Religion conducted a series of commemorations of the National Teacher's Day by doing gymnastics together with a number of teacher representatives. 07.00 WIB, also attended by the Minister of Religion and all levels of the Ministry of Religion. In his opening remarks, Minister of Religion, Fachrul Razi hoped that with the exercise with the teachers, it could be a part in building the future of the nation's children. "We hope that this will be more advanced to build the future of our children who will lead us in the future. , "said Minister of Religion Fachrul Razi at the Ministry of Religion, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). As he delivered his remarks, Fachrul mingled and joined in doing gymnastics with the teachers. Also visible was Deputy Minister of Religion Zainud Tauhid who also participated in gymnastics. In line with the Minister of Religion, Head of Sub-Section of the Directorate of Madrasah Teachers and Education Personnel, M. Sidik Sisdianto also revealed that the existence of gymnastic activities with these teachers, was also part of the teachers teachers in religious special schools know more closely with the Minister of Religion, Fachrul Razi. Teachers participating in this activity are teachers who teach from kindergarten to high school level. Sidik then explained the two main objectives of this activity, namely introducing the figure of the new Minister of Religion and cultivating a healthy culture in the madrasa environment. "Introducing ministers and teachers. Secondly, we are again cultivating a healthy culture in Madrasas," said the Head of Sub-Directorate of the Directorate of Teachers and Personnel. Madrasah Education, Ministry of Religion M.Sidik Sisdianto.Moreover, Sidik Sisdianto also explained in detail, related to the activities of the Ministry of Religion in commemorating the 2019 National Teachers' Day, which culminated in a series of events to be held in Lampung. "This is the first series. So after this later there were 2 notes & with the Minister and madrasa teachers in Jogja on November 9. Then on November 10 there was an announcement of the madrasa teacher photo and vlog contest.On 12 to 16 there was a gift of the teacher's constitution.On 21 to 23 there was an award of teachers and educated achievers Date 21-23 there is a learning innovation competition for teachers and the peak in Lampung later, after that a and teacher symposium, "concluded M.Sidik Sisdianto, Head of Sub-Directorate of the Directorate of Madrasah Teachers and Education Personnel, Ministry of Religion.
